name: Goalkeeper Training VR
description:
Welcome to Goalkeeper Training VR! A funny VR goalkeeping game for Oculus Quest!

Get immersed in the game with the awesome and huge stadium, the crowd singing and the amazing realism of the VR goggles.

The game features 3 different modes
  • Midfield: The ball is shot from the midfield point
  • Penalty: The ball is shot from a point near the area
  • Free kick: The ball is shot from random points all over the field
All modes come with 2 variants
  • Standard: You can only conceal 4 goals, the 5th goal will supose game over
  • Training: You can conceal as many goals as you want, there's no game over
Credits

This game was made in less than a week by 2 Game Development students (Adrián and Javier), the stadium and ball were made months ago for another unreleased project (Made by Adrián and Ana).

  • Adrián Aguilar: Ball model and textures, Advert Textures, Stadium blocking, Scene mounting, Programming, SFX, Menus
  • Javier Mollá: Advert Shaders, Ball particles, Scoreboard hologram shader, Scoreboard programming, Post Processing
  • Ana Climent: Goal model and textures, Bench model and textures, Crowd models, Stadium textures
Disclaimer: The game was made to be 100% compatible with Oculus Quest 2, we don't guarantee compatibility with other VR gogles since we can't try the game in any other goggles.
